title: Women of Aibom: in the time before before
creator_contributor_role: Department of Information and Extension Services, production company
form: Short films/Short films - Papua New Guinea

Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Women - Papua New Guinea

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Women - Papua New Guinea
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women - Papua New Guinea
description: The making of clay pots is very important for the women of Aibom. Itm is their means of barter for the food which is grown in other villages. The methods of making, decorating and firing the pots are shown.
